ygData.subject: Re: Which sites I use for what.
ygData.msgSnippet: First thing I check daily is Everlore just to catch all the latest news and to keep up to date. Also because the posts from Gordon and Brad are on there so i
ygData.messageBody:
First thing I check daily is Everlore just to
catch all the latest news and to keep up to date. Also
because the posts from Gordon and Brad are on there so i
don't have to read the damned Flameplayboard.. erm oop
sorry ment Gameplay :)<br><br>I further use Everlore
becuase of a couple of good guides they have on Trade
skills and on Quest, Yes you are right they can be
frustrating and confusing with people asking the same
questions over and over. But sometimes it's a nice read
too. (Fire pot "quest")<br>I also use it before I buy
my new spell to check wath they do and what the best
(player submited tacticts are.<br><br>Maximumeq, Yes I
also use it to check for prices and because they have
everything crossreferred.. Making looking for class or race
specific armor/weapons a breeze.<br><br>EQvault, Mainly
for if I want to read player fiction stories, and
view player submited art (used to draw a lot myself).
It also is the first site i go to if I can't log
into Everquest as it has a serverstatus list dead
smack on the front page, so i can see if the servers a
re down or not.<br><br>Oh and I'd like to come here
ofcourse and babbel a bit about nothing of grave
importance :P
